Articles.Content:
Now that Take Two owns KSP, is there any word if there will be any new licensing agreements for making KSP merchandise?

I'd really like to buy a coffee mug like what used to be available at CafePress, the one with the big KSP logo on one side, and the lineup of Bill, Bob and Jeb on the other.
Sadly, it's not available any more, and the other KSP-related ones (with independent art) are less recognizable.  I want to be able show off my love of the game at work, and get other people hooked too...
Moving to KSP Network, since this isn't about the actual game itself.
